title:
[Fabrizio Romano] 🚨⚪️⚫️ Juventus and PSG are on the verge of closing verbal agreement for Randal Kolo Muani on loan until June.

❗️ Kolo Muani will make his decision in the next hours, with more proposals on the table from Premier League.

Juve are pushing to seal the deal as soon as possible.
